item.title: MIUI V14.0.10.0.TLACNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 12S Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12S Ultra China

Codename: thor

Version: V14.0.10.0.TLACNXM | 13.0

Size: 7.9 GB

MD5: 2d6cfde4822493d79a14125d64436783

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Couldn't use Intune in some cases
Updated Android Security Patch to January 2023. Increased system security.
[Camera]
New: 2X quick zoom for the rear camera in the "Photo", "Video", and "Documents" modes

Download: Here
